description:
Robin and Chopper have both been lost to the Foxy Pirates, and there`s only one match remaining in the Davy Back Fight! Luffy`s got a plan to get his mates back, but failure would mean the end of the Straw Hats forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guerre de capitaines ! Le combat final !
The Captains Square Off! The Final Combat Round!
ศึกของกัปตัน การดวลครั้งสุดท้าย
キャプテン対決! 最終戦コンバット!
